generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:300,500,700&display=swap");.card{position:relative;perspective:62.5em;font-family:Lato,sans-serif;box-sizing:border-box;height:62.5em;width:100%;font-style:normal;line-height:1.5em;font-size:16px;max-width:31.25em;max-height:17.8125em;color:#fffcf7}.card,.card *,.card :after,.card :before{padding:0;margin:0;box-sizing:inherit}.card :active,.card :after:active,.card :after:focus,.card :after:hover,.card :after:visited,.card :before:active,.card :before:focus,.card :before:hover,.card :before:visited,.card :focus,.card :hover,.card :visited{outline:0 solid}.card img,.card video{max-width:100%}.card img{border:0;vertical-align:middle;display:inline-block;object-fit:cover}.card button{color:inherit}.card li{list-style-type:none}.card a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit;outline:none;cursor:pointer}.card address{font-style:inherit}@media screen and (max-width:375px){.card{max-height:21.875em}}.card-flip{top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;position:absolute;transform-style:preserve-3d;transition:transform .5s ease;will-change:transform}.card:hover .card-flip{transform:rotateY(180deg)}.card-body,.card-body-back,.card-body-front{position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:flex-start;align-content:center;flex-wrap:nowrap;flex-basis:100%;z-index:10;overflow:hidden;padding:1em;box-shadow:0 5px 9px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}@media screen and (max-width:375px){.card-body,.card-body-back,.card-body-front{align-items:normal;flex-wrap:wrap}}.card-body-front{background:#2d3641;background:radial-gradient(circle,#2d3641 0,#1a1f29 100%);border-bottom-left-radius:2em;border-top-right-radius:2em;flex-direction:column;align-items:flex-start;align-content:center;flex-wrap:nowrap}.card-body-back,.card-body-front{backface-visibility:hidden;position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;justify-content:flex-end}.card-body-back{transform:rotateY(180deg);background:#393944;background:radial-gradient(circle,#2d3641 0,#1a1f29 100%);border-top-left-radius:2em;border-bottom-right-radius:2em}.card-centered{align-content:center;align-items:center;justify-content:center;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap}.card-mx{margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto}.card-heading{font-size:1.6em}.card-subtitle{font-size:1.2em;font-weight:300}.card-body-back .card-subtitle{color:#cd4a2e;text-decoration:underline}@media screen and (max-width:375px){.card-heading,.card-subtitle{text-align:center}}.card-contact{margin-top:.5em;font-size:.9em;position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:center;flex-wrap:nowrap}.card-contact-info{margin-left:2em;font-size:1em;height:min-content;line-height:1.1}.card-contact-icon{height:2em;width:1.5em;line-height:2em;text-align:center;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;position:absolute;left:0}.card-contact-icon>svg{height:1em;width:1em;color:#cd4a2e}.card-brand{margin-bottom:1em;height:3.75em;display:block}@media screen and (max-width:375px){.card-brand{order:-1;position:static}}.card-brand-back{min-width:6.25em;width:6.25em;margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.card-bg-front,.card-bg-front-2{position:absolute;left:-13rem;top:2rem;width:38em;height:38em;z-index:-1;border-radius:50%;background-color:#cd4a2e;transition:transform 2s;box-shadow:2px -9px 7px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.card-bg-front-2:after,.card-bg-front:after{content:"";display:block;left:0;top:0;width:35em;height:35em;border-radius:50%;background-color:#2d3641;transition:transform 2s;z-index:-1;border:2px solid #cd4a2e;position:absolute}.card-bg-front-2{z-index:-2;left:-9.6875em;top:-25.4375em;bottom:auto;box-shadow:5px 5px 9px rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.card-bg-front-2:after{bottom:0;top:auto;left:1.25em}.card-bg-img{position:absolute;right:-14rem;top:0;height:100%;z-index:-3}
